author: Brave Software
title: Brave creates new TLD on the blockchain
description: In a major step forward for digital identity and internet decentralization, Brave has become the first browser to launch its own on-chain top-level domain.
content: SAN FRANCISCO–May 20th, 2025: In a major step forward for digital identity and internet decentralization, Brave has become the first browser to launch its own on-chain top-level domain. In partnershi… [+5026 chars]
